title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Design Thinking Workshop for Overcoming Creative Blocks

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic design processes and experience in language education
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain at least three causes of creative block occurrences
Learners can design creative problem-solving strategies applying qualitative research-based analysis methods
Learners can maintain psychological safety and concretize ideas during team-based project processes
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
